title: The Last Stand
logline: A group of survivors must defend their sanctuary against overwhelming odds.

title: Digital Dreams
logline: In a world where thoughts become reality through technology, one programmer discovers the dark truth.

title: Family Bonds
logline: Three estranged siblings reunite to save their family farm from foreclosure.

title: Midnight in Moscow
logline: A journalist uncovers a conspiracy that goes to the highest levels of government.

title: The Comedy Club
logline: A washed-up comedian gets one last chance to make it big in the underground comedy scene.
